english.segment1: I cherish the treasure. The treasure of you. Lifelong companion. I give myself to you. God has enabled me. To walk with you faithfully. And cherish the treasure. The treasure of you
english.segment2: As I obey the Spirit's voice. And seek to do His will. I then can see the wisdom of His plan. For as He works His will in me. I then can love you selflessly. And by His grace, can pledge my love. To you
english.segment4: This sacred vow I make to you. Does not contain an "if". Though I'm aware that trials lie ahead. I will love you and pray with you. And through it all, I will stay with you. Our home will be a refuge of. Unconditional love
english.segment6: Cherish the treasure. The treasure of you
